tag_list: entrepreneur, filmmaker, director, producer, writer, art-director, web-applications
overview:
Gus Johnston is an Art Director, Writer, Filmmaker and Entrepreneur whom together with his partners Dan Washusen and Stu Clayton recently launched the web start up Digital Pigeon (a premium file transfer service targeted at creative industries).

Gus, himself comes from a creative background, having spent more than a decade writing and producing advertising campaigns for some of the world’s largest and well known brands.
